text: My team needs an engineer/data scientist/programmer to work on the Federal Aviation Administration's Wide Area Augmentation System (WAAS). The job is in Oklahoma and offers low cost of living, great work/life balance, technical freedom, and interesting challenges. Here's a longer write up I have made: https://gist.github.com/bjcubsfan/5433ea47b33a3c46f8da Here's the official job ad: https://lstechllc.applicantpro.com/jobs/350503.html
